sentences.en: Both parties should draw a lesson from the past bitter experience which caused irretrievable losses.
sentences.cn: 过去的不幸事件造成了不可挽回的损失,双方均应从中吸取教训.

sentences.en: Budget mistakes result in an irretrievable injury to the profits.
sentences.cn: 预算错误通常会给公司利润造成无法挽回的损失.

sentences.en: For Chiang's position in Manchuria was irretrievable.
sentences.cn: 蒋在满洲的败局明明是无法挽回的.

sentences.en: In the eternal universe, every human off chance to live. His existence is unique and irretrievable.
sentences.cn: 在永恒的茫茫宇宙中,我们每个人都只有一次生存机会, 我们每个人的存在都是独一无二的,我们每个人的生活都 是 不可再来的.

sentences.en: The breakdown of their marriage was irretrievable.
sentences.cn: 他俩婚姻破裂,已无法和好如初.

sentences.en: the irretrievable breakdown of the marriage
the irretrievable breakdown of their marriage
The money already paid is irretrievable.
sentences.cn: 已经支付的钱是无法收回的.
通常, 这一过程不可逆变.

sentences.en: Verify and select information before irretrievable wiping.
sentences.cn: 在彻底擦除前确认和选择信息.

sentences.en: What a tragedy if the sport suffers irretrievable damage because this issue is ducked.
sentences.cn: 如果该运动因这一问题被回避而承受无法弥补的损失，那将是何种悲剧。

sentences.en: You are supposed to get rid of carelessness, for it often leads to irretrievaBle errors.
sentences.cn: 你们一定要克服粗枝大叶, 因为粗枝大叶常常引起无可挽回的错误.

words.tran_cn: 不能挽回地；不能补救地

trans.tran_cn: 不能挽回的，不能复原的，不可弥补，不可挽回
trans.tran_en: an irretrievable situation cannot be made right again
